DOC.detailed_description: To determine prevalence osteopenia vitamin D deficiency HIV-1 infect , HAART naive Thai patient compare HIV-1 uninfected Thai participant . Furthermore , determine change BMD twelve month HIV-1 infect Thai patient TDF-based HAART regimen compare patient non-TDF contain regimen .
